bug.author: hougangliu
bug.description:
0.6.1 kubeflow UI cannot visit juypter Page with "Sorry, /jupyter/ is not a valid page" <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10126721/62172993-ec0fb800-b366-11e9-92bb-8e88569dacdf.png></denchmark-link>
Pipeline page cannot work well, too <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10126721/62172974-d3070700-b366-11e9-90fe-0c01c201e9c4.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.95. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

It seems like their may be some kind of routing issues. Can you try navigating to the following URLs which bypass the Kubeflow navigation menu? /pipelines/ /jupyter/ /katib/ /metadata/ Each of those should resolve to the UI for those applications without the top navigation bar. If those work as intended, it will help us isolate the issue. /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/prodonjs>@prodonjs</denchmark-link>
/cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/avdaredevil>@avdaredevil</denchmark-link>
/area centraldashboard /area frontend
How are you connecting to Kubeflow? Services are routed through the ISTIO gateway. You need to connect to the gateway
